usage.eng: The more you care, the more you have to lose.

usage.cn: 我不在乎你对我的不在乎。
usage.eng: I don't give a shit on your care the least about me.

usage.cn: 只要你记得我，我不介意整个世界都把我遗忘了。
usage.eng: If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets.

usage.cn: 主动久了会很累， 在乎久了会崩溃！
usage.eng: Active long will be very tired, care about for a long time will crash!
